note.p: Daughter of Swinton Colthurst Holland and his wife, Anna Willets; born in Malta. A second cousin of Charles and Emma Darwin. Married the Rev. Richard Croft (1808–69) at Trinity Church, St Marylebone, Middlesex, in 1857.
